item.description:
Our next meditation meet up will be on August 27th at 7:30 pm. The topic for this session will be focused on: What is a spiritual community; what are its benefits and how to find one.
Researches done in the field exploring the spirit-mind-body connection have shown that when people are part of a spiritual community, their resiliency is increased. Practicing meditation is another factor in keeping a sense of peace even in challenging moments. This meet up will be an opportunity to meditate as well as learning and being with people desiring to grow in consciousness.
I am looking forward seeing you and contact me if any questions,
Rev. Christine
If you cannot attend this meet up, but are interested in the topic, I will have a meditation meet up in Cambridge with the same topic.
item.name: August Meditation on the 27th:Topic: What is a spiritual community
